text: Area code 910 and 472 are area codes for North Carolina. It covers the southeastern part of North Carolina, including cities such as Wilmington, Fayetteville, and Jacksonville. It was created on November 14, 1993, when it was split from area code 919. It was split by 336 in 1997 and overlaid by 472 on October 7, 2022. 910
title: Area code 910 and 472
